short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces instances of 'election' with 'rigged election' in articles, blogs, op-eds, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Donald trump had long warned of the possibility of a rigged election, and although he wasn't correct, we may be able to sleep a bit better at night telling ourselves that he was.
